revision.revremark: Initial version created from SoundTraxx_Eco_Diesel version 4
Fix after clarification with SoundTraxx - no CV1.301/429, but CV1.300/428 are used for Hi-Low effect, no short airhorm. Bell sounds remains available though disabled.

family.name: Econami Diesel UK
family.comment: These are the UK retail version Econami Diesel decoders

variable.tooltip: Controls how the engine RPMs interact with the speed step setting of the throttle
variable.label: Engine Notch Rate

variable.tooltip: When this option AND manual (notching) engine control is enabled, locomotive will not move until engine starts
variable.label: Engine RPM Interlock

variable.tooltip: Determines whether prime mover will start up automatically or manually
variable.label: Engine Auto Start Enable

variable.comment: For all models except Gas Turbine and Genset
variable.tooltip: Controls how the dynamic brakes interact with the engine RPMs
variable.label: Dynamic Brake Override
Forward facing Airhorn Select
variable.tooltip: Selects which airhorn to use when in forward direction

variable.label: Rear facing Airhorn Select
variable.tooltip: Selects which airhorn to use when in reverse direction

variable.label: Bell select
variable.tooltip:
Bell disabled in Econami UK versions.
The High-tone Airhorn (F1 by default)
is enabled in place of the bell in UK decoders.
Bell remains available however to be remapped to another function key.
Select one of six prime mover sound effects
variable.label: Prime Mover Select

variable.tooltip: Select one of two air compressor sound effects
variable.label: Air Compressor Select

variable.tooltip:
Sets the volume of the two-tone airhorn,
both high- and low-tone.
variable.label: Two-tone Airhorn Volume

variable.tooltip: Sets the volume of the prime mover
variable.label: Prime Mover Volume

variable.tooltip: Sets the volume of the air compressor
variable.label: Air Compressor Volume

variable.tooltip:
Sets the volume of the dynamic brakes
Not used for UK decoders
variable.label: Dynamic Brake Volume

variable.tooltip: Sets the volume of the radiator fans
variable.label: Radiator Fans Volume

variable.tooltip: Sets the volume of the air reservoir Spirax valve releasing
variable.label: Air Tank Spirax Valve Volume

variable.tooltip: Adjust the duration that occurs between each subsequent release of the automatic Spirax valve sound effect
variable.label: Spirax Valve Release Rate

variable.tooltip:
adjusts the track Voltage in analog mode at which the engine exhaust sound begins
calculated as: Starting Voltage = CV 219 ÷ 10 + 5V
variable.label: Analog Mode Engine Start Voltage (0-255)
Brake
variable.tooltip: Mapping function keys F0-F28 to any of the decoder's effects

variable.label: RPM+
variable.tooltip: Mapping function keys F0-F28 to any of the decoder's effects

variable.label: RPM-
variable.tooltip: Mapping function keys F0-F28 to any of the decoder's effects

variable.item: Extended Function Map Two Shorts Signal
variable.label: Two Shorts Signal
variable.tooltip: Mapping function keys F0-F28 to any of the decoder's effects

variable.item: Extended Function Map One Long Signal
variable.label: One Long Signal
variable.tooltip: Mapping function keys F0-F28 to any of the decoder's effects

variable.label: High note of Airhorn
variable.tooltip: Mapping function keys F0-F28 to any of the decoder's effects

variable.label: Dynamic Brake
variable.tooltip:
Mapping function keys F0-F28 to any of the decoder's effects
Not used for UK decoders

variable.label: High-Low Airhorn effect
variable.tooltip: Mapping function keys F0-F28 to any of the decoder's effects

variable.label: Low note of Airhorn
variable.tooltip: Mapping function keys F0-F28 to any of the decoder's effects

Sets the status of automatic effects when moving in reverse direction

variable.tooltip: Sets the status of automatic effects when moving in reverse direction
